title.rendered: Office 365 |5-Device  Mac/Android/Window |1 TB Cloud Storage |Multilanguage |Global Edition – 1Year

content.rendered:
Microsoft Office 365 Pro Plus comes with all the classic apps you need to get your work done at home or student. It includes the 2016 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access,  Outlook. The software can be installed on a PC.
  • This is an outright purchase of Office  Home and Student so you don’t have to worry about renewals.
  • You will receive the classic 2019 versions of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access, and Outlook.
  • The 2016 version of Excel comes with a variety of new chart types allowing you to display your data in different ways.
  • With the 2019 version of Outlook you’ll be able to use the @ symbol to add contacts into your email or calendar item for a more streamlined experience.
  • PowerPoint includes a new Zoom option which allows you to deliver non-linear presentations, seamlessly switching between slides.

excerpt.rendered:
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by WhatsApp or Write to us at: support@codesforever.com

  • Only Account details i.e. User id and password will be sent by email .Sign in on office.com and download product.The Account  Details will activate the  full version of Microsoft Office 365
  •  Office 365 on up to 5 PCs or Macs or 5 tablets or 5 Smartphones + 1 TB One Drive Storage from Official Microsoft Portal
  • Its a Global Edition  ( International Edition ) Activate Worldwide .
  • New Office 365 account will be sent. Cannot be used to convert existing user IDs / subscription based accounts to 1 YEAR validity
  • Cannot bind with your Microsoft account.
  • Username and Password cannot be changed with your desired one.
  • Note: – Do remember password for user ID when it was changed at first login at office.com as it is not recoverable.We cannot Reset it once changed by You.
  • office 365 is for 1 year only, Always Keep Backup For your one drive Data as Account is not renewable
